item.title: The .io domain name
item.description: What is the .io domain name and why is it problematic? Link to heading Preferred by tech companies, the .io domain name does not actually refer to the input-output word pair (I/O) we all learned about in primary school. I remember that guy with the mustache and white lab-coat trying to calm us down when the first Windows 95 PCs arrived… We suddenly got slapped in the face by the ever-accelerating pace of technology and subsequently forgot all our (very limited) MS-DOS skills.
